name: THE MOROCCAN CASTLE II
description:
THE MOROCCAN CASTLE II  

Here is The Second Part Of  // The Moroccan Castle Game // 

The Story : 

Everything Started in 2019 

After The Archeology Mohammed  Visited and Old Moroccan Castle  In Tetouan  ( The North Of Morocco ) , He Found Himself Lost and Without a Way Out From This Castle 

After a Few years 

 A Young ( You )  Archeology  Heard About this Story  , and He decided To Go And Discover The Secret About this Old Moroccan Castle .

Controls  (  Customizable in The Setting ):  

 MOVEMENT W , S , A ,D JUMP SPACECROUCH C - CNTRLSPRINT ( RUN )SHIFTINSPECT - EXAMINE - USEEINVENTORY TABPEAK ( RIGHT - LEFT )X - Y PAUSE ESCAPESHOOT MOUSE LEFT CLICKZOOMMOUSE RIGHT CLICKUSING ITEMS1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 

The Game Have : 

• Realistic Movement 
• Realistic Camera Movement 
• Interaction With Anything
• Save/Load System (Player Data, Scene Data, Inventory, Encryption)
• Pausing System 
• Psychological Horror
• Setting System ( You Can Customize The Settings and The Controls )
• Player Lean and Wall Detection  
• Item Switcher
• Cross-Platform Input (PC, PS4, XONE)
• Advanced Menu System (Cross-Platform Support)
• Objectives System 
• Interact Manager 
• Examination System (Rotate, Double Examine, Papers)
• Light Items (Flashlight, Hinge Lantern, Candle)
• Backpack Inventory Expand Pickup
•  (Keypad Lock, Keycard Lock, Padlock)
• Realistic VHS Player 
• Ambience Zones
• Water Buoyancy
• Interactive Lights (Lamps, Switchers, Animation)
• Props, Collectable Items, much more..
System Requirements :

Recommended Minimum CPU :   2.8Ghz // Intel i5 GPU :  4 GB VRAM 
RAM :  8 GBCPU :   2.3Ghz // Intel i3
GPU :  1 GB VRAM 
RAM :  4 GB
